```{r}
# 1st question
power <- 0.8
z_score <- qnorm(p = 1 - power)
z_score
n <- 2 * (z_score + 1.96) ^ 2
n
```

```{r}
del_se <- 1.96 - z_score
se <- 1/del_se
n <- 2/se ^ 2
n
```

```{r}
# rolling dice
# using chi square test to test if they are fair dices
p1 <- 1/6
p0 <- 5/6
chisq.test(x = c(48,35,15,3),
           p = c(
                p0 ^ 3, 
                choose(3,1) * p1 * p0 ^ 2,
                choose(3,2) * p1 ^ 2 * p0,
                p1 ^ 3
                )
           )
```
